articles.title: White House has issued formal threat to Bolton to keep him from publishing book - CNN
articles.description: The White House has issued a formal threat to former national security adviser John Bolton to keep him from publishing his book, "The Room Where It Happened: A White House Memoir," sources familiar with the matter tell CNN.
